resources.string: Pandora isn\'t available in this country.
Try enabling Portaller, a free smart DNS service, in the settings.
Failed to connect to the Internet.
Failed to connect to the internet. Do you have a working connection?\nIf you\'re using Portaller, the service may be down. Try disabling it in the app settings.
An external Pandora error has occurred.
The station will be added to your station list. You can remove it at any time.
